item.title: Project 2: Climate change
item.description: Nevertheless, as be harangued them, the satisfaction and admiration unanimously excited by his costume were dissipated by his words; and when he reached that untoward conclusion: “As soon as his illustrious eminence, the cardinal, arrives, we will begin,” his voice was drowned in a thunder of hooting. “Begin instantly! The mystery! the mystery immediately!” shrieked the people. And above all the voices, that of Johannes de Molendino was audible, piercing the uproar like the fife’s derisive serenade: “Commence instantly!

item.title: About
item.description: Nice to meet you! My name is Radek and I live in Germany. My focus is to create insightful projects from structured data. Large part of my work is related to environmental and scientific topics, because these are my life-long passions. I possess PhD in the didactics of physics and had the pleasure to teach physics and math for several years as well as doing science outreach for the Czech Academy of Sciences.

item.title: Connect
item.description: Interested in my work? Let us connect on the following platforms! LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/radek-kricek/ GitHub: https://github.com/radek-kricek Tableau Public: https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/radek.k.ek
